\- Flavor Description: Crisp, Fresh and Lightly Bitter. Amalgamation of a Bright Oolong with notes of a Mildly Grassy and Tannic Green Tea and a Crisp White Tea; coupled with a Mild and somewhat Menthol-ish\* Flavor / Cooling Effect on Inhale. Light Bodied with a Tea Like and Refreshing Mouthfeel.

‚ñ∫ Notes
